step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders relatively stable. Focus on opening your fingers wider as instructed.
Your shoulder movement is excellent. Try to straighten your arms more and keep your wrists from bending excessively.
Shoulders are well-engaged. Work on making a tighter fist and reducing wrist bend for better form.
Great job relaxing and stretching your arms overhead. Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Your shoulders are moving well. Keep your wrists straighter and try to maintain a consistent fist throughout the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers and then make a tight fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax and stretch back up.
